products.description: Charmant, non? We discovered this 1930's vintage 'Fleurs et Insectes' educational illustration in a dusty stack of school books at a flea market in Paris and carefully restored it to create this unique art print. Also available as part of a Gallery Wall Set. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Charmant, non? We discovered this 1930's vintage 'Feuilles et Fruits' educational illustration in a dusty stack of school books at a flea market in Paris and carefully restored it to create this unique art print. Also available as a Gallery Wall Set. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

This colourful art print was inspired by a book written in 1692 about mixing watercolours (centuries before Pantone!). Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Inspired by a vintage French wooden game for kids, this fun Shapes art print will add instant impact to any playroom, nursery or bedroom wall! Also available as part of our Alphabo Gallery Wall. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

An apple a day... This bold and bright Apple art print will add a cool, colourful look to any child's or tween bedroom wall. Also available in our Fruit Salad Gallery Wall set. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Don't forget to Tidy Your Room! This sweet print by artist Nora Aoyagi features an illustration of a fox tidying its den. A fun addition to any child's nursery, playroom or bedroom wall. Also available in our House Rules Gallery Wall set. Giclée printed on 200gsm museum quality paper sourced from sustainably managed forests.

A fun addition to any child's nursery or playroom, or a family kitchen wall. Also available in our House Rules Gallery Wall set.
